title: Upwork: Teach Me How to Use AI Video Tools to Create High-Quality Medical Educational Videos
description:
I‚Äôm looking for an experienced AI video creator or motion graphics expert who can help me learn how to create sleek, short, medically oriented educational videos using tools like Runway ML, Pika, Kaiber, or similar platforms.

üîç Important: I‚Äôm not looking to use software with a steep learning curve like Blender. I want to work with AI tools or web-based platforms that allow for quick creation with minimal technical setup.

‚∏ª

üéØ The Ideal Outcome:

I want to produce modern, high-quality videos that clearly illustrate:
‚Ä¢ New synapses forming in the brain
‚Ä¢ A person lifting weights, followed by a zoom-in on bones getting denser
‚Ä¢ Physiological processes like neurogenesis, macular degeneration, muscle hypertrophy, or atherosclerosis
‚Ä¢ All animations should look aesthetic, modern, clean, and not like random stock footage stitched together

‚∏ª

üí° I Need Help With:
‚Ä¢ Recommending the best AI platform or subscription tool (I‚Äôm okay paying up to $50/month)
‚Ä¢ Teaching me how to use that platform effectively, including:
‚Ä¢ Prompting
‚Ä¢ Workflow setup
‚Ä¢ Any layering or enhancement strategies
‚Ä¢ Ideally through a live Zoom session or a custom walkthrough video with clear instructions

‚∏ª

üß™ Before Hiring:

‚úÖ Please submit a short demo video (20‚Äì60 seconds) showing one of the visuals above (e.g. synapse formation or zooming into bones). This proves you‚Äôre fluent with the tools and can help me get the results I want.
$50.00
